title: For the readers
author: VD
content_html:
As some of you know, I write a bit of fiction as well as the occasional column. And as Nate has already gleaned, the CAVE is close to opening for perusal, not that there’s a whole lot there now. Anyhow, as some people have expressed an interest in my novels, I wanted to find out how many people think they might be interested in acquiring said books before ordering a box from the publisher. There’s three in all, one sci-fi, two fantasy. I’m not asking for a firm commitment, just trying to estimate if I need ten or one hundred.

Unfortunately, it won’t be possible to sign them since they won’t ever pass through my hands. Of course, if you’d ever seen the painful, quasi-legible scribble that passes for my signature, you wouldn’t think it was much of a loss.
